**To:** Colonel Charles B. Hollender
**From:** The Ninth Overseer
**Subject:** Task Force Reassignment
January 5th, 1990
[[/div]]
[[<]]

-----

Colonel Hollender,

Yesterday, January 4th, 1990, an atrocious crime was committed against the SCP Foundation. A day that will live in history forever. We were deliberately attacked, without reason or warning by the Clear Skies Initiative, resulting in the barbarous murder of hundreds of Foundation employees in broad daylight. For decades, the Clear Skies Initiative has been an inconsequential thorn in our side, but this recent development has pushed us too far. 

As a result of this bestial act of aggression against innocent human life, we will be taking every measure to ensure we are able to protect our future from this belligerent threat. We are in grave danger, Colonel Hollender, there is no doubt about that. I believe that I interpret the feelings of the entire Foundation when I take direct action to ensure that this form of antagonistic, mindless aggression will never happen again.

As of now, your task force will be stationed full-time in the Eurasian supercontinent where the Clear Skies Initiative have the strongest grasp. I trust that together, we can eliminate this scourge from the world.

-The Ninth Overseer
//,,Department of Pursuit and Suppression,,//

[[/div]]
[[/<]]

[[div style="background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid black; margin: 1em; padding: 1em; border-radius: 1em;"]]

[[size 140%]]T[[/size]]he Foundation is under grave threat. Hostile Groups of Interest are slowly closing in around them and claiming territory, paying off informants to burrow deep into the Foundation's secrets. The world is slowly becoming //their// world and not //our// world. As the Foundation slips out of the spotlight, other groups rise to fill the power vacuum, leaving large swaths of destruction in their wake. Corruption runs rampant in all levels of authority and the Foundation starts to turn on itself.

Agent Hollender is tasked with addressing the latest threat to the Foundation, the Clear Skies Initiative.

The Clear Skies Initiative aims to destroy the anomalies in our midst and return the world to complete normalcy through any means necessary. 

[[/div]]

__**Name:**__ Charles Benedict Hollender

__**Birthdate:**__ November 2nd, 1954

__**Rank and Position:**__ Colonel, Marksman, MTF Titan-1 -- Squad Disciple-1-1

__**Security Clearance:**__ 4

__**Current Station:**__ UKSHAC, Protected Garrison Area-10, Scottish Highlands

__**Background:**__ Agent Hollender was originally recruited to the Foundation after the 1974 Cyclone Tracy, where several instances of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3456 SCP-3456] manifested and attacked Hollender's team of SASR operatives. Hollender along with Lieutenant Colonel Micah Jennings Adler were the only survivors. Following an interview by Foundation field agents, it was determined that they would operate well within the Mobile Task Force branch of the Foundation. The two joined MTF Iota-10 and worked with several different task forces throughout several decades. Hollender is a respected military leader, often collaborating with several task forces and Overwatch elements to hunt and combat hostile Groups Of Interest.

__**Name:**__ Riley "Roach" Dallas

__**Birthdate:**__ November 2nd, 1959

__**Rank and Position:**__ Staff Sergeant, Marksman, MTF Titan-1 -- Squad Disciple-2-2

__**Security Clearance:**__ 2

__**Current Station:**__ UKSHAC, Protected Garrison Area-10, Scottish Highlands


__**Background:**__ Staff Sergeant Riley Dallas was a field agent in the United States Delta Force’s B Squadron and was recruited to the Foundation in 1983 after distinguishing himself in the Invasion of Grenada.

Not much is known about Dallas' time in Delta Force, besides working with the acclaimed Shiva Team who eliminated many high-value targets during the Cold War and often being deployed alone for reconnaissance missions. He has also been noted to speak several languages to near perfection, including Kurdish, Polish, and Russian. 

Dallas' nickname comes from an operation in the 1970s involving an R-36M (SS-18 Satan) missile launch, where he rescued a squad of Delta Force operatives that were pinned by hostile Russian forces, earning the Medal of Honour.

__**Background:**__ Part of the United States Marine Corp, Winston served in the Korean War in the 5th Marine Regiment under Colonel Chris Steele. Eventually transferred to the Army Night Stalkers, Winston continued to serve until 1953 when [[[SCP-2191]]] escaped containment, terminating the majority of his squad.

After containment teams resecured the area around SCP-2191, Lieutenant Vaughn was intercepted and interrogated. He was later recruited into the Foundation after detailing the events of SCP-2191's attack, and how Winston managed to subdue and escape multiple instances of SCP-2191-1.

[[=]]
+++ __SCP FOUNDATION__
[[/=]]

Slowly slipping from the limelight, the Foundation isn't what it used to be. They'll fight tooth and nail for their title as the most powerful group in the anomalous world, fighting to keep anomalies away from the public.

-----

@@ @@

[[=]]
+++ __CLEAR SKIES INITIATIVE__
[[/=]]

The Clear Skies Initiative first made contact with the Foundation in 1949 after the start of the Cold War, sprouting from the chaotic imbalance in the world. The group slowly claimed territories and began utilizing front companies to conceal operations. Their primary goal is to eliminate anomalous entities and phenomena from the world, and groups that utilize the anomalous. They have allied themselves with the Global Occult Coalition, and have an uneasy alliance with the Chaos Insurgency. Since 1949, the Clear Skies Initiative have spread from Central Europe to several countries in the Middle East and branched to areas in Eastern Asia.

-----

 @@ @@

[[=]]
+++ __GLOBAL OCCULT COALITION__
[[/=]]

As the Foundation's crown slips, the Global Occult Coalition was quick to claim their territory. The GOC owns territories in Europe, the Middle East, Southern Asia, and has begun expansion to North America. They seek to eradicate anomalous phenomena from the world and eliminate anyone who stands in their way.

-----

 @@ @@

[[=]]
+++ __CHAOS INSURGENCY__
[[/=]]

A splinter from the Foundation, the Chaos Insurgency seeks to integrate anomalous objects into the real world. They may act patriotically, but they won't bat an eye if they can exploit the anomalous for a leg-up on the competition.

[[=]]
+++ SCP Protected Deployment Area-10

-

+++++ **Official Designation:** SCP Foundation Loch Na Sealga Protected Deployment Facility

+++++ **Site Identification Code:** UKSHAC-Area-10

--

[[/=]]

Protected Deployment Area-10 acts as a 'jumping-off point' for Foundation containment teams, Mobile Task Force operations, and field deployments. Equipped with higher-grade defensive capabilities and counter-measures, Deployment Facilities like this one require sieges to conquer.

Area-10 is the base of operations for Mobile Task Force Titan-1 ("Off The Books"), housing all personnel of the task force and equipment needed for missions. Embedded into the hills next to Loch Na Sealga, Scottish Highlands, the bowels of Area-10 stretch deep into the hills.

-

+++++ **Official Designation:** SCP Foundation Cambridge Bay Secure Facility

+++++ **Site Identification Code:** NUCANU-Area-02

--

Secure Area-02, located near Cambridge Bay, in the Queen Elizabeth Islands, is the Ninth Overseer's personal facility. Equipped with highly advanced Anti-Air defences, nothing is getting within six kilometres of the Area's perimeter without the Foundation knowing about it.
